message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM. 

The paper proposes a new approach to video captioning that incorporates object detection and generates captions with similar meaning to ground truth captions. This involves the use of sequence-to-sequence models, attention layers, and learning metrics. Given these techniques, the paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Additionally, the use of object detection and semantic similarity suggests that the paper may also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. Finally, the use of video frames and captions suggests that the paper may also belong to the Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
